section.para: Fonts can be specified for the following areas:-
A particular font can be specifed for an area by specifying
Where the <area> is the name and the <font> is specified according the Font.decode() specification (see java.awt.Font). This essentially is a contationation of the name, style and size as below:
In addition to the font the amount of space between lines of text can also be specified.

Exploration menus are only shown during exploration, and not when running as a client or standalone. This property allows you to turn off the default displaying of exploration option during exploration: to then bring the options up you can hold down the Ctrl key while right-clicking to bring up the menu.
For debugging purposes details about the mouse interaction can be seen in a separate window. Add the following property to show the window.
